price: Ese (ababangikanyamana) bishyiriyeho abavugizi batari Allah? Vuga uti “None se n’iyo baba nta cyo batunze cyangwa nta bwenge bafite (mwakomeza kubiringira)?”
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ شُفَعَآءَۚ قُلۡ أَوَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū min dūni al-lahi shufaʿāa qul awalaw kānū lā yamlikūna shayan walā yaʿqilūna
